title: ERROR CLIENT IS NOT OPPENING
body: So, i`m trying to open LOL client since like 30 min ago, and when I click on it, on my screens says " "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." Since I can`t open the client i can`t see whats wrong. PLS HELP!!!!

replies.body:
Typically when it hear this particular description of not being able to launch the game, it's because there are missing system permissions that prevent League from operating properly. Because the League client interacts with a lot of files outside of the installation directory, it needs certain permissions. 

I recommend taking a stab at the steps inside our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if those resolve the issue for you. Let me know the results of those steps.
